scripts.protoc:
docker run --rm --user $(id -u):$(id -g) -v $(pwd)/../../node_modules:/node_modules -v $(pwd)/../../protobufs/schemas:/defs -v $(pwd)/src/protobufs/generated:/out namely/protoc:1.50_1 --plugin=/node_modules/ts-proto/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=/out --ts_proto_opt=esModuleInterop=true,exportCommonSymbols=false,outputServices=false,useOptionals=none,unrecognizedEnum=false,removeEnumPrefix=true --proto_path=/defs $(ls ../../protobufs/schemas/*.proto | xargs -n 1 basename | xargs -I{} echo '/defs/{}' | tr '
' ' ')
scripts.lint: biome format src/ --write && biome check src/ --apply
